subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Fish, who has said he will retire after the United States Open, lost, 2-6, 6-3, 1-6, 7-5, 6-3, to 18th-seeded Feliciano López and said, “I worked as hard as I could.”
snippet: Fish, who has said he will retire after the United States Open, lost, 2-6, 6-3, 1-6, 7-5, 6-3, to 18th-seeded Feliciano López and said, “I worked as hard as I could.”
